definitions.Jia1: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]; surname Jia;
definitions.jia1: to add; plus; (used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned); to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb); to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth);
